name: Equine
description:
Control a robot horse through increasingly difficult levels, with movement partly inspired by QWOP. Watch out for stage hazards and obstacles, and don't hit your head! Touch the charger at the end of the level with your legs to complete a level. Can you beat your previous time?

Features:

  • Tough-to-master gameplay: move by individually controlling your character's hind legs and forelegs
  • Additional challenge in the form of collectible microchips that unlock extras
  • Your best time for each level is recorded

Controls (PC):
F: activate hind legs
J: activate forelegs
R: retry level
N: next level (when level is completed)
Esc: return to menu
Alt + Enter: toggle fullscreen

Controls (Android):
Use the on-screen icons. For the leg controls, there's a fair bit of tolerance so you don't have to hit the icons exactly.
